import java.io.*;
class Divs {
    public static void main(String args[])
    throws IOException{ 
    try{
		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		String str = br.readLine();
		int l = str.length();
		int n = Integer.parseInt(str);
		boolean yes = true;
		int digits[] = new int[l];
		int temp = n;
		for(int i=l-1;i>=0;i--){
			digits[i] = temp%10;
			temp /= 10;
		}
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++){
			if(digits[i]!=0){
				if(n%digits[i]!=0){
					yes = false;
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		if(yes==true) System.out.println("Valid");
		else System.out.println("Invalid");
    }catch(Exception e){;}
	}
}
